definition[0]: money that is frequently moved from one country to another in order to make a profit
definition[1]: money that is moved quickly from place to place in order to be invested in the most profitable things in different places
example[0]: If interest rates go lower, some of the hot money will start to leave.
definition[2]: money obtained from illegal activities that is invested in ways which hide its source
example[1]: the hot money generated by the cocaine industry
